data.title: Used-car prices are still sky-high — but they may be easing
data.description: Wholesale used-car prices fell in February, but they will likely remain high for a while longer.

data.title: Home prices could soar another 20% this year, but Black families are struggling to benefit
data.description: It's going to take adding inventory of all types to significantly slow price growth and unlock homeownership for more Americans.

data.title: A rare bright spot in the stock market may be set to fizzle out
data.description: Tech stocks, like the rest of the broader market, have seen their fair share of ups and downs since Russia's invasion of Ukraine at the end of February. But for one part of the technology sector — cybersecurity -— it's been a roaring bull market for the past few weeks.

data.title: Russia's war on Ukraine is a 'defining moment' of the century, says John Kerry
data.description: Energy price volatility is "something we're going to live with for a little while," said John Kerry, who oversees climate issues for the Biden administration.

data.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Bed Bath & Beyond, United, PVH and more
data.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

data.title: Investing Club: We're adding to a health stock in Monday's market slide — here's what else we're watching
data.description: With another rough day in the markets unfolding, we want to put a small amount of money to work in quality companies.

data.title: Russia's invasion of Ukraine could cut auto production by millions of vehicles this year
data.description: The Ukraine crisis could worsen rising inflation and propel already record-high vehicle prices even higher.

data.title: Higher food prices and slumping trade. How the war in Ukraine could hit Africa
data.description: As Russian troops tear through Ukraine, swathes of Africa are gearing up to bear the brunt of a potentially drawn-out conflict between the ex-Soviet republics — two of some of the continent's most cherished trading partners.

data.title: Hold onto your wallets, gas prices are heading to an all-time record high
data.description: With gas prices at a 14-year high, it's hard to imagine paying even more at the pump. And yet, prices are heading higher, experts say.

data.author: Philip Aldrick
data.title: Surging Price of Everything Spells Stagflation, Risks Recessions
data.description: Surging Price of Everything Spells Stagflation, Risks Recessions
